record.title: DESIGNATING APRIL 30, 2007, AS "DIA DE LOS NIÑOS: CELEBRATING YOUNG AMERICANS"

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Judiciary Committee be discharged from consideration of S. Res. 177.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid on the table, and any statements be printed in the Record with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
